name_original: Off road tuk tuk auto rickshaw driving 3D simulator free 2016 - Take tourists to their destinations through hilly tracks
description:
Hey guys! Have you ever tried to drive a crazy Tuk Tuk off road rickshaw when on you are on summer vocations? If no then here is the best chance for you to drive the Tuk Tuk off road auto richshaw on mountain tracks. In this adventurous game you have the opportunity to drive off road tuk tuk rickshaw on zig zag tracks of dangerous hilly areas. In this cool driving simulation game you will get the feeling you are on a holiday and will be able to drive this classic tuk tuk off road auto rickshaw in different climatic conditions like in rain, sunshine, day and night. You have to pick the tourists from different stops and drop them to their destinations.
In this thrilling game you have to avoid the other traffic vehicles like the pickup trucks, police cars,civilian cars, busses etc. This game will test your skills of acceleration, steering, stunting and parking. If you can all handle what it takes then you will become a good tuk tuk off road rickshaw driver.
So get ready to take the ride of most amazing and thrilling vehicle of 2016
Features of Off road tuk tuk auto rickshaw driving simulator 3d
Challenging levels for ultimate fun
• Amazingly realistic handling of off road auto rickshaw
• Best 3D tuk tuk rickshaw game of 2016
• Astonishing rickshaw driving experience in this tuk tuk Simulator
• Smooth controls with breaks and acceleration paddle
• HD 3D graphics to enjoy amazing driving experience
• Advanced vehicle physics & breathtaking challenges
